attributes.action: Order the new Attorney General to unseal the David Kelly Inquest Report.
attributes.additional_details: The previous Attorney General, the public believe, was being hovered over by Tony Blair`s Dirt Book when he sealed this report, creating what could be the biggest cover up of criminal activity since Jimmy Savile was given the keys of the lunatic asylum he should have been living in.  The public demand that this Inquest Report immediately be unsealed.
